verbs.description: INDIANAPOLIS , Ind.-- [ARG1: Hoosiers] [V: gathered] [ARGM-LOC: in front the United States Attorney ’s office] [ARGM-TMP: Friday afternoon] , [ARGM-ADV: protesting the Trump administration 's practice of separating parents and their children at the border] .

INDIANAPOLIS , Ind.-- [ARG0: Hoosiers] gathered in front the United States Attorney ’s office Friday afternoon , [V: protesting] [ARG1: the Trump administration 's practice of separating parents and their children at the border] .
